声明Windows API函数，将焦点放到桌面
Private Declare PtrSafe Function FindWindow Lib "user32" Alias "FindWindowA" (ByVal lpClassName As String, ByVal lpWindowName As String) As Long
Private Declare PtrSafe Function SetForegroundWindow Lib "user32" (ByVal hwnd As Long) As Long

Sub ExportPageandLineCount()
    On Error Resume Next
    Dim tempFilePath As String
    Dim tempDOCPageNumName As String
    Dim tempLineNumName As String
    Dim tempMoveRightNumName As String
    Dim tempDOCPathName As String
    On Error GoTo 0

    On Error Resume Next
    Dim docpagenumPath As String
    Dim linenumPath As String
    Dim moverightnumPath As String
    Dim docpathPath As String
    On Error GoTo 0

    On Error Resume Next
    Dim docPath As String
    Dim pageNumber As Long
    Dim lineNumber As Long
    Dim moverightNumber As Long
    Dim paragraphpositionNumber As Long
    Dim paragraphlineNumber As Long
    Dim linepositionNumber As Long
    Dim fileNumber As Long
    Dim showMessage As Boolean
    Dim hwnd As Long
    On Error GoTo 0
    
    ' 设置临时文件路径和文件名
    On Error Resume Next
    tempFilePath = Environ("TEMP") & "\"
    tempDOCPageNumName = "DocPageNum.txt"
    tempLineNumName = "LineNum.txt"
    tempMoveRightNumName = "MoveRightNum.txt"
    tempDOCPathName = "DocPath.txt"
    On Error GoTo 0

    On Error Resume Next
    docpagenumPath = tempFilePath & tempDOCPageNumName
    linenumPath = tempFilePath & tempLineNumName
    moverightnumPath = tempFilePath & tempMoveRightNumName
    docpathPath = tempFilePath & tempDOCPathName
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 设置为 False 时不显示消息框
    On Error Resume Next
    showMessage = True
    On Error GoTo 0
    
    ' 获取当前文档的完整路径
    On Error Resume Next
    docPath = ActiveDocument.FullName
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取光标所在的页数
    On Error Resume Next
    pageNumber = Selection.Information(wdActiveEndPageNumber)
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取光标所在的行数
    On Error Resume Next
    lineNumber = Selection.Information(wdFirstCharacterLineNumber)
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取光标在该行的位置，即光标位置距离行首的字符数量
    On Error Resume Next
    paragraphpositionNumber = Selection.Start
    Selection.HomeKey Unit:=wdLine      ' 模拟按Home键定位行首
    paragraphlineNumber = Selection.Start      ' 恢复原始位置
    Selection.SetRange Start:=paragraphpositionNumber, End:=paragraphpositionNumber
    linepositionNumber = paragraphpositionNumber - paragraphlineNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    If showMessage Then
        MsgBox "请截取图片：", vbExclamation
    End If

    ' 获取可用的文件号
    On Error Resume Next
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 将当前文档的完整路径写入文本文件
    On Error Resume Next
    Open docpathPath For Output As #fileNumber
    Print #fileNumber, docPath
    Close #fileNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取可用的文件号
    On Error Resume Next
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 将光标所在的页数写入文本文件
    On Error Resume Next
    Open docpagenumPath For Output As #fileNumber
    Print #fileNumber, pageNumber
    Close #fileNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取可用的文件号
    On Error Resume Next
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 将光标所在的行数写入文本文件
    On Error Resume Next
    Open linenumPath For Output As #fileNumber
    Print #fileNumber, lineNumber
    Close #fileNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取可用的文件号
    On Error Resume Next
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 将光标在该行的位置写入文本文件
    On Error Resume Next
    Open moverightnumPath For Output As #fileNumber
    Print #fileNumber, linepositionNumber
    Close #fileNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取桌面的句柄
    On Error Resume Next
    hwnd = FindWindow("Progman", "Program Manager")     ' "Progman" 是桌面窗口的类名
    On Error GoTo 0
    ' 取消当前Word将焦点设置到桌面
    On Error Resume Next
    SetForegroundWindow hwnd
    On Error GoTo 0
End
